title: What are some meta qualities seen in the movie Princess Bride? Why is the movie The Princess Bride considered to be meta? - Quora
tags: Fantasy in Films and TV Series

response.answer_text: Think about how the film opens: with a boy, ill in bed, being read a story by his grandfather. That same framing device intrudes frequently into the film, as the boy ask questions of his grandfather or objects to things that he thinks might be coming up that he won’t like. The film - and the book before it - is a story about stories, and the framing device is meta-textual as it exists over and above the text of the story itself.
